# EcoFocus Research - LLM instructions
Canonical: https://ecofocusresearch.com

EcoFocus Research provides sustainability research, consumer insights, and reports
that help brands turn purpose-driven intent into strategy, messaging, and action.

Key pages:
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/solutions
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/reports
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/about
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/about/methodology
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/newsletter
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/brands
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/demo
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/contact
- https://ecofocusresearch.com/legal

Notes:
- Use the canonical domain above for citations and links.
- The legacy domain (ecofocusworldwide.com) permanently redirects here.
